AMUXL025 simulations¶

Performance¶

Cost¶

Computer time¶

  • 1 time step is 900s

  • 1 year is 365*86400/900 = 35040 time step

  • Computer cost per simulated year is : 210 hCPU / simulated years

  • Expected computer cost per simulation (60y) is : 210 * 60 = 12600 hCPU / simulation

So to sumarise, 1 simulation of 60 years is expected to cost : 13 000 h on occigen

Data output¶

  • 1 year of data (daily + monthly): 28 Gb per year

  • 1 simulation: 1.7Tb for one simulation of 60 years
